living_room.label: Living Room
living_room.description: You are standing in a small living room. There is a door to the north and a door to the south.

lore-condition.success: The north door seems to be locked.
lore-condition.fail: The north door has been unlocked.

unlock.fail: You need a key to unlock the door.
unlock.success: The key fits and unlocks the door.

force.success: The door won't budge. You really need that key.

kitchen.label: Kitchen
kitchen.description: The kitchen is dirty, there are dishes everywhere and it smells like rotten eggs. You see footsteps leading to and from a drawer.

jar.label: Glass Jar
jar.description: On a table sits glass jar. It looks like it has something inside.

break.label: Broken Glass Jar
break.description: A bunch of broken pieces of glass. Watch out, you might get hurt.

knife.label: Knife
knife.description: On the counter you see a surprisingly sharp butter knife.

mop.label: Mop
mop.description: In the corner sits mop that can be used for cleaning.

trash-bag.inspect: Just a plain old trash-bag. Empty though.
trash-bag.label: Trash Bag
trash-bag.description: On the floor lies an empty trash bag.

drawer.label: Drawer
drawer.description: One of the kitchen drawers is slightly opened.

inspect-condition.success: There is something shiny in the drawer

key.label: Key
key.description: An old rusty key that looks like it could fit the internal doors.

bedroom.label: Bedroom
bedroom.description: A messy bedroom that has been recently slept in, judging by the smell.
